hanzi-su-wiki:
政

Значения

Управление, администрация; политика; правительство

Мнемоника

  • Умение обычной палкой 攵 остановить 正 врага. Предотвращать.

  • "Правительство должно делать правильные вещи 正."
purpleculture_pinyin:
zhèng
political; politics; government
политический; политика; правительство
rtega_mnemonic:
政政RSgovernment, political affairs
  • hand 攵 moving the country in the correct 正 direction
  • RS. correct 正 action with the hand 攵
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 正 indicates the sound; 攵 (script) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:

政治 [ zhèng zhì ]: politics; political
政策 [ zhèng cè ]: policy; Classifiers: 个
行政 [ xíng zhèng ]: administrative; executive (attributive)
财政 [ cái zhèng ]: finances (public); financial
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 正 [ zhèng ] straight, right, proper, correct, just, true
    • 攵 [ pū ] to rap, to tap; script; to let go
heisig_chinese_memo: Those involved in politics are always trying to elect the correct taskmaster.
heisig_constituent: politics, correct, one, ceiling, stop, footprint, taskmaster
heisig_story: To the many definitions for politics that already exist, this character offers yet another: correct taskmastering. Think about what the primitives tell us. On the one hand, we see the pessimistic wisdom that politics has to do with taskmastering, maneuvering people with or without their will. And on the other, we see the campaign assurances that this duty can be performed correctly if only the right candidate is given a chance.
koohiiStory1: Those involved in politics are always trying to elect the correct taskmaster.
koohiiStory2: Insane political correctness on the left, and facists taskmasters on the right- thats politics in a nutshell right there.
jp_example_words:
行政(ぎょうせい): administration
財政(ざいせい): economy, financial affairs
政権(せいけん): administration, political power
政策(せいさく): political measures, policy
政党(せいとう): (member of) political party
政府(せいふ): government, administration
政治(せいじ): politic
jp_readingExamples: 政治 (せいじ), 行政 (ぎょうせい), 家政 (かせい), 政 (まつりごと)
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: It's correct in winter to focus on politics and the government. Elections are happening, in the new year politicians are being sworn in. Winter is government time!
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine all this politics and government talk as you shiver outside in the winter cold. You’re freezing and you’re bored, but you know this is the right (correct) thing to do.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Everyone involved in politics and government wields a special saber (せい). If two political parties are arguing, they'll whip out their sabers and start slashing away!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture two different politicians, both wielding sabers, fighting to make the government the way they want it to be! Who are you rooting for?
Ru_trainchinese: zhèng: (графема) политика; политическая сила; административные вопросы внутри государственных учреждений; дела семейные или внутри организации
Kanshudo_mnemonic: a correct (正) strike (攵) is the job of the government
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: Those involved in politics are always trying to elect the correct taskmaster.
humanum_full_description_en:
Bronze inscriptions are " smooth " and " positive " is also sounded. " Zheng " is the first text of Zheng, like " stop " (toe) moving toward the destination. The word " policy " is added from "攴". "攴" is like holding a stick, meaning that it will be conquered and conquered. It is the original word for conquest and conquest (Gao Hongjin, Ma Xulun).

Inscriptions on Jin said to conquer, Guo Jizi's white plate: "Use the political (levying) and the (barbarian) side". "Da Dai Li Ji. "Using Soldiers": "The princes are in power, not to the emperor."

The inscriptions also indicate expropriation, and the classics are called " levying ". E Jun Qizhou Festival: "When you see the golden festival, you will not be politicized (levied)." He also expressed politics and political affairs. Wang Sun's survivor Zhong: "Benefits political virtue."

"Shuowen": "Politics, righteousness. From stubbornness to righteousness, righteousness."
humanum_short_description_en: " politics " is the conquest of " levy " this word, said after politics.
humanum_full_description:
金文從「攴」，「正」亦聲。「正」是征的初文，象「止」(腳趾)向着目的地前進之形。加從「攴」而為「政」字，「攴」象手持棍棒，疑會征伐之意，是征討征伐的本字(高鴻縉、馬敍倫)。

　　金文表示征伐，虢季子白盤：「用政(征)䜌(蠻)方」。《大戴禮記．用兵》：「諸侯力政，不朝於天子。」

　　金文還表示徵收，典籍作「征」，鄂君啟舟節：「見其金節則毋政(徵)」，「不見其金節則政(徵)」。又表示政治、政事，王孫遺者鐘：「惠于政德。」

　　《說文》：「政，正也。从攴从正，正亦聲。」
humanum_short_description: 「政」是征伐的「征」本字，後表示政治。

政字的基本解释

政
zhèng
治理国家事务：政治。政府。政党。政权。政纲。政策。政令。政绩。政见。政客（为个人或某一集团利益从事政治活动的人）。政局。政变。参政。议政。
国家某一部门主管的业务：财政。邮政。民政。
家庭或集体生活中的事务：家政。
姓。

政字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhèng］
［《廣韻》之盛切，去勁，章。］
(1)政治；政事。
(2)政权；权柄。
(3)政令；政策。
(4)指禁令。
(5)政府。
(6)谓主持政事。
(7)指主持政事的人。
(8)做官一任为一政。
(9)指家庭或团体的事务。
(10)职务。
(11)指处分、惩罚。
(12)指作战部署和阵势。
(13)指日月五星等。参见“七政”。
(14)通“正”。长官；官吏。
(15)通“正”。改正；纠正。
(16)通“正”。治理。
(17)通“正”。正直；公正。
(18)通“正”。只；就。
(19)通“正”。正好；恰好。
(20)通“正”。正当；正在。
(21)通“正”。即使；纵然。参见“政復”。
(22)姓。
[②]［zhēng］
［《集韻》諸盈切，平清，章。］
通“征1”。
(1)征伐；征讨。
(2)赋税。
(3)指徭役。

政字的英文翻译

◎ 政
certain administrative aspects of government, politics

政字的康熙字典解释

【卯集下】【攴字部】　政； 康熙笔画：8； 页码：页469第06
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?之盛切，音正。【說文】正也。【釋名】政，正也，下所取正也。【易·賁卦】君子以明庶政。【書·舜典】以齊七政。【傳】日月五星各異政。又【洪範】農用八政。【疏】食爲八政之首，故以農言之。【周禮·天官·大宰】建邦之六典，四曰政典，以平邦國，以正百官，以均萬民。【左傳·桓二年】政以正民。　又【禮·王制】五十不從力政。【註】力政，城道之役也。　又姓。【廣韻】出姓苑。　又【集韻】【韻會】?諸盈切，音征。賦也。通作征。【周禮·地官·均人】掌均地政。【註】政，讀爲征。地政謂地守地職之稅也。　【說文】从攴作政。政字原从攴作。

政字的源字形

政字的起名意思

：政字本义匡正。指治理国家事务，国家某一部门主管的业务或家庭、集体生活中的事务。

[Mao Ji 2] [Department of Characters] 　 Zheng; Kangxi Strokes: 8; Page Number: Page 469 06
【Tang Yun】【Ji Yun】【Rhyme Meeting】【Zheng Yun】? It's the prosperous cut, the sound is correct. [Said Wen] Zheng Ye. 【Release name】Politics, righteousness, and righteousness for the next. [Easy·Ben Hexagram] The gentleman uses the rule of the Ming Dynasty. [Book·Shun Code] Qi Zhengzheng. [Biography] The sun, the moon and the five stars have different policies. Also 【Hong Fan】Eight policies for agricultural use. [Shu] Food is the first of the eight political affairs, so it is based on the agricultural language. 【Zhou Li·Tian Guan·Da Zai】The six codes of state building, the fourth is the political code, which is based on the peace of the state, the righteous officials, and the equalization of the people. [Zuo Zhuan·Huan Ernian] Politics is the righteousness of the people.　[Ritual·Royal System] Fifty-fifty non-competent politics. [Note] Lizheng, the battle of the city road also.　Another last name. [Guang Yun] Out of the surname garden.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui]? Zhu Yingqie, sound sign. Fu also. Pass for levy. 【Zhou Li·Land Guan·Jian Ren】Hands equal land administration. [Note] Zheng, read as levy. The land administration is also the tax on the defensive duties.　【Said the text】Government from 攴. The political character was originally written from Yun.

Source glyph
Politics
Name meaning
: The original meaning of the political character is corrected. Refers to the governance of state affairs, the business of a certain department of the state or the affairs of family or collective life.
政
“政”是治理国事,使之方向正确。《说文》称:“政,正也。“政字的甲骨文、金文、小篆虽写
法略有不同,但均是手持棍棒或武器(、寺),指挥、引导人的足(Y、走)走向一个方向
或目标(日、一)。造字意图十分明确,既可由此会意,也是“从支,正声”的形声字。隶书(汉
《韩仁铭》)虽摆脱了古文字的圆弧笔画,仍可看到以上字素的基本痕迹。
政
政
zhèng
甲骨文
金文1
金文2
金文3
金文4
古象
盟书
石经
小業
|书
Политика
«Политика» - это управлять делами государства и направлять их в нужное русло.
«Shuowen» говорит: «Политика, Чжэнъе». Хотя надписи на костях оракула, бронзовые надписи и маленькие печати политических персонажей написаны немного по-разному, все они используют палки или оружие (, храмы), чтобы направлять и направлять ноги людей (Y, ходьбы).) К направлению или цели (день, день).
Намерение иероглифа очень ясное, это можно понять из этого, и это также пиктофонетический персонаж "Цунчжи, Чжэншэн".
Хотя официальный сценарий (Han Renming in Han) избавился от дуговых штрихов древних персонажей, основные следы вышеперечисленных персонажей все же можно увидеть.
Политика
Политика
Бронза 4
Древний слон
Союз Книга
Ши Цзин
Малый бизнес
| Книга
zhèng, zhēng
I сущ.
1) zhèng управление (государством); дела управления (страной)
为政以德 осуществлять управление страной добротой (мягкостью, личным примером)
2) zhèng государственный строй; администрация; правительство; административный; правительственный
民政 гражданское управление
3) zhèng принципы управления; политика; правила; уклад; закон, устав, статут; норма
道之以政 вести его (народ), опираясь на законы
家政 домашний уклад, домострой
五政 пять норм взаимоотношений между людьми
4) zhèng служебные обязанности; повинности, работа
弃政而去 отказаться от службы и уйти
不从力政 не привлекаться на физические работы
5) zhèng правитель; глава
学政 глава учебных заведений
6) zhèng * астр. светило
七政 семь светил (солнце, луна и 5 планет)
7) zhēng налог, обложение
地政 налоги с земель
II гл.
1) zhèng вм. 正 (выправлять, выпрямлять; исправлять)
2) zhēng вм. 征 (идти походом, карать)
III zhèng наречие
* верно, очевидно, ясно; в самом деле
而政逆之 с очевидностью воспротивиться этому
政须 действительно необходимо
IV zhèng собств.
Чжэн (фамилия)

政

Значения

Управление, администрация; политика; правительство

Мнемоника

  • Умение обычной палкой 攵 остановить 正 врага. Предотвращать.

  • "Правительство должно делать правильные вещи 正."
Radicals: 正, 夂  (correct, winter)
Meaning Mnemonic
It's correct in winter to focus on politics and the government. Elections are happening, in the new year politicians are being sworn in. Winter is government time!
Imagine all this politics and government talk as you shiver outside in the winter cold. You’re freezing and you’re bored, but you know this is the right (correct) thing to do.
Reading Mnemonic
Everyone involved in politics and government wields a special saber (せい). If two political parties are arguing, they'll whip out their sabers and start slashing away!
Picture two different politicians, both wielding sabers, fighting to make the government the way they want it to be! Who are you rooting for?
